name: Action Figure Maker - Create Your Own Action Superhero
name_original: Action Figure Maker - Create Your Own Action Superhero
description:
Love Playing With GI Joe Toys? Can't Stop Watching Action Movies? Wish You Could Create Your Own Action Figure?

Wait No More! This Free App is Exactly What You Are Waiting For!

Create Your Own Action Hero in this Awesome Dress Up Game!

-Hundreds Of Action Figure Combinations!
-Hours Of Fun!
-For Kids and Action-Lovin' Adults Too!

Share Your Creations on Facebook, Instagram and Email!

I'LL BE BACK! But First, Download This Free App!
